title: Correction: Components of Coated Vesicles and Nuclear Pore Complexes Share a Common Molecular Architecture
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 2, issue 12.

        10.1371/journal.pbio.0020380

In Materials and Methods, the sentence “The magnetic beads were added to the extract to a ratio of about 8 ×109 beads per g of cells” contains an error. The correct amount of beads is 8 × 108, i.e., ten times less.

Published February 15, 2005
